name: Heavy Laidlaw Accelerator
customPrimary: Hits on hull or armor creates explosion dealing additional %s fragmentation damage.

name: Gatling Beam
customPrimary: Hits on hull or armor frequently arc to weapons and engines, dealing extra EMP and energy damage. Hits on shields have a chance to generate a shield-penetrating arc based on the target's hard flux level.

name: Capacitons Discharger
customPrimary: Fires electric arcs that can chain to %s additional small targets dealing %s weapons damage.

name: Besomar Scattercannon
customPrimary:
Each shell has a fuse set to explode at a random distance, resulting in a barrage that's increasingly more deadly at closer ranges.

Will target missiles if no other targets are in range.

name: Psotnik Interference Autocannon
customPrimary: Submunition hits on hull or armor have a %s chance to arc to weapons and engines, dealing %s EMP damage.

name: Rubicon
customPrimary: On successful hit %s projectiles appear close to target, each projectile deal %s kinetic damage, generates %s flux.

name: Verlioka
customPrimary: %s: Projectiles fly through everything, dealing constant EMP damage across their width. Disable all missiles' warheads.

name: Laidlaw Accelerator
customPrimary: Hits on hull or armor creates explosion dealing additional %s fragmentation damage.

name: Abyssus Sabot MIRV
customPrimary: Submunition hits on hull or armor have a %s chance to arc to weapons and engines, dealing %s EMP damage.
